Items.Title: Oversight - Older Adult Workforce Programs.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, S.884/A.6331, to direct the New York State Office for the Aging and the Empire State Development Corporation to expand encore entrepreneurship in New York State to empower individuals 50 years of age or older to establish small businesses.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: NYS Office for the Aging and the Empire State Development Corporation to expand encore entrepreneurship in NYS to empower individuals 50 years of age or older to establish small businesses. (S.884/A.6331)

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, S.3004/A.6324, which would establish an Office of Older Adult Workforce Development within the State Office for the Aging.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Establish an Office of Older Adult Workforce Development within the State Office for the Aging. (S.3004/A.6324)

Items.Title: Oversight - Older Adult Workforce Programs.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Filed, by Committee

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, S.884/A.6331, to direct the New York State Office for the Aging and the Empire State Development Corporation to expand encore entrepreneurship in New York State to empower individuals 50 years of age or older to establish small businesses.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: NYS Office for the Aging and the Empire State Development Corporation to expand encore entrepreneurship in NYS to empower individuals 50 years of age or older to establish small businesses. (S.884/A.6331)

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, S.3004/A.6324, which would establish an Office of Older Adult Workforce Development within the State Office for the Aging.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Establish an Office of Older Adult Workforce Development within the State Office for the Aging. (S.3004/A.6324)
